item.title: Spoken of a parrot in the village of Mowbray
item.summary: How a parrot can make the lateral click like a person. (L VIII.29. 8556 rev., note). A parrot seen by |han≠kass'o in Mowbray sounds like a person, because it can make the lateral click.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-29
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: describes a parrot he sees at Mowbray
a bird which sounds like a man as it can make the lateral click
a parrot seen at Mowbray and commented on by |han≠kass'o
